remarks:
Closure law for negative of reals.  The weak deduction theorem ~ dedth is used to convert hypothesis of the inference (deduction) form of this theorem, ~ renegcli , to an antecedent.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-1997.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) 

---

 Closure law for negative of reals.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jan-1997.)
statement: renegcl $p |- ( A e. RR -> -u A e. RR ) $.
